history.proof: unfold dc_dec, dc_eval. split. - intros H. sauto lq: on depth: 3. - intros H. sauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros φ ν k c. unfold dc_dec, dc_eval. split. - intros H. inversion H as [H1 H2]. unfold fst, snd in H1, H2. simpl in H1, H2. rewrite H1. rewrite H2. reflexivity. - intros H. split. + specialize (H 0). simpl in H. unfold fst, snd. simpl. rewrite H. reflexivity. + intros n. specialize (H (S n)). simpl in H. unfold fst, snd. simpl. rewrite H. reflexivity.
